title: Role
description: Represents additional information about a relationship or property. For example a Role can be used to say that a 'member' role linking some SportsTeam to a player occurred during a particular time period. Or that a Person's 'actor' role in a Movie was for some particular characterName. Such properties can be attached to a Role entity, which is then associated with the main entities using ordinary properties like 'member' or 'actor'.

endDate.title: End date
endDate.description: The time at which the role was no longer effective. (in ISO 8601 date format).

startDate.title: Start date
startDate.description: The time at which the role was initiated. (in ISO 8601 date format).

roleName.title: Role Name
roleName.description: A role played, performed or filled by a person or organization. For example, the team of creators for a comic book might fill the roles named 'inker', 'penciller', and 'letterer'; or an athlete in a SportsTeam might play in the position named 'Quarterback'.
